benchmark_details.name: MATHHAY
benchmark_details.overview: MATHHAY is an automated benchmark designed to evaluate long-context mathematical reasoning capabilities of LLMs, built through document collection, question generation, quality control, and haystack construction.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the long-context mathematical reasoning abilities of LLMs in more real-world scenarios.

data.source: Constructed through automated document collection, question generation, and quality control.
data.annotation: Questions verified for correctness by authors.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on the proportion of correct answers from the models tested.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better mathematical reasoning capabilities in long contexts.
methodology.validation: The benchmark is validated through comparison of answers generated via different methodologies.
